summary: The deranged cookie murderer known as the The Gingerdead Man is about to crash a studio lot and leave behind a trail of bloody murder and hilarious mayhem.
cast: Michelle Bauer|Pieter Christian Colson|Michael Deak|Bruce Dent|Travis Joe Dixon|Junie Hoang|Kevan Moezzi|Frank Nicotero|Greg Nicotero|Joseph Porter|Kelsey Sanders|Viorel Sergovici|David Sivits|Jon Southwell|John Vulich|Bryce Wagoner|Zack Wagoner|John Carl Buechler|Emily Button|Sam Cain|Esmeralda De Pal|David DeCoteau|Ricardo Gil|Adam Green|Nick W. Green|Kenneth J. Hall|Nick Hawk|Nicholas Leiting|Johnnie Oberg Jr.|Nicole Schilperoort|Vivien Voss|Jacob Witkin|Parker Young
title: Gingerdead Man 2: Passion of the Crust
